newsitem.title: FRANCE: French group may bid for Thomson Multimedia - paper.
newsitem.headline: French group may bid for Thomson Multimedia - paper.

text.p: A French "white knight" could make a bid in the coming days for Thomson Multimedia, the consumer electronics firm tipped until now to be hived off to Daewoo as part of the government sell-off of Thomson SA, daily Le Tribune Desfosses said on Monday.

The newspaper said the bid could be submitted in the coming days to the privatisation commission which is examining the Thomson sell-off dossier after the government said last week it preferred an offer for Thomson SA made by Lagardere.
Preliminary discussions were underway and centred around a "well-known businessman" the newspaper said.
It said the real technological value of the group had only dawned on those involved in the dossier late in the sell-off process.
